author: tabish
msg: Add a longer wait to allow the Transport to reconnect on slower hardware.

author: nzhang
msg: HIVE-1607. Reinstate and deprecate IMetaStoreClient methods removed in HIVE-675 (Carl Steinbach via Ning Zhang)

author: julianfoad
msg: For issue #3696 "FSFS error - Can't open file 'db/transactions/props'"
error report instead of an assertion.  We should trace and fix the cause,
but that's proving difficult and as long as the error is known to occur in
real life we want to report it.  A follow-up to r980046.
(get_txn_proplist): Replace an assertion with a regular error report.

author: jim
msg: Note that 2.3.8-alpha is expected to be the last alpha
